articles.author: NORMAN GOH
articles.title: Xi says China will stand with Asian peers to 'combat unilateralism' - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Beijing's leader also calls on Malaysia to 'safeguard' region's bright prospects
articles.content: KUALA LUMPUR -- President Xi Jinping on Wednesday stressed that China would stand with Malaysia and other Asian nations to combat unilateralism and protectionism, as the Trump administration's U.S. t… [+160 chars]
